message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm really interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,500.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $11,000 is a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $10,800. What do you think?
